00018    /* 
00019    * Constructor.
00020    */
00021    IntDistribution::IntDistribution() 
00022     : histogram_(),
00023       min_(0),
00024       max_(0),
00025       nBin_(0),
00026       nSample_(0),
00027       nReject_(0)
00028    {}
00029    
00030    /* 
00031    * Copy constructor.
00032    */
00033    IntDistribution::IntDistribution(const IntDistribution& other) 
00034     : histogram_(),
00035       min_(other.min_),
00036       max_(other.max_),
00037       nBin_(other.nBin_),
00038       nSample_(other.nSample_),
00039       nReject_(other.nReject_)
00040    {
00041       if (nBin_ > 0) {
00042          assert(nBin_ == max_ - min_ + 1);
00043          assert(other.histogram_.capacity() != 0);
00044          histogram_.allocate(nBin_);
00045          for (int i=0; i < nBin_; ++i) {
00046             histogram_[i] = other.histogram_[i];
00047          }
00048       } else {
00049          assert(other.histogram_.capacity() == 0);
00050          assert(min_ == 0);
00051          assert(max_ == 0);
00052          assert(nSample_ == 0);
00053          assert(nReject_ == 0);
00054       }
00055    }
00056    
00057    /* 
00058    * Assignment operator.
00059    */
00060    IntDistribution& IntDistribution::operator = (const IntDistribution& other) 
00061    {
00062       // Check for self assignment
00063       if (this == &other) return *this;
00064 
00065       // Check validity of other object
00066       if (other.nBin_ > 0) {
00067          assert(other.nBin_ == other.max_ - other.min_ + 1);
00068          assert(other.histogram_.capacity() != 0);
00069       } else {
00070          assert(other.nBin_ == 0);
00071          assert(other.histogram_.capacity() == 0);
00072          assert(other.min_ == 0);
00073          assert(other.max_ == 0);
00074          assert(other.nSample_ == 0);
00075          assert(other.nReject_ == 0);
00076       }
00077 
00078       // Assign primitive values
00079       min_      = other.min_;
00080       max_      = other.max_;
00081       nBin_     = other.nBin_;
00082       nSample_  = other.nSample_;
00083       nReject_  = other.nReject_;
00084 
00085       // Allocate histogram if necessary
00086       if (nBin_ > 0) {
00087          histogram_.allocate(nBin_);
00088          for (int i=0; i < nBin_; ++i) {
00089             histogram_[i] = other.histogram_[i];
00090          }
00091       }
00092 
00093       return *this;
00094    }
00095    
00096    /* 
00097    * Destructor.
00098    */
00099    IntDistribution::~IntDistribution() 
00100    {}
00101 
00102    /* 
00103    * Read min and max from file.
00104    */
00105    void IntDistribution::readParam(std::istream& in)
00106    {
00107       read<int>(in, "min", min_);
00108       read<int>(in, "max", max_);
00109       nBin_ = max_ - min_ + 1;
00110       histogram_.allocate(nBin_);
00111       clear();
00112    }
00113    
00114    /*
00115    * Set parameters and initialize.
00116    */
00117    void IntDistribution::setParam(int min, int max)
00118    {
00119       min_      = min;
00120       max_      = max;
00121       nBin_     = max_ - min_ + 1;
00122       histogram_.allocate(nBin_);
00123       clear();
00124    }  
00125    
00126    /* 
00127    * Zero all accumulators.
00128    */
00129    void IntDistribution::clear()
00130    {  
00131       nSample_ = 0; 
00132       nReject_ = 0; 
00133       for (int i=0; i < nBin_; ++i) {
00134          histogram_[i] = 0;
00135       }
00136    }
00137    
00138    /* 
00139    * Add a value to the histogram
00140    */
00141    void IntDistribution::sample(int value)
00142    {
00143       int i;
00144       if (value >= min_ && value <= max_) {
00145          i = binIndex(value);
00146          histogram_[i] += 1;
00147          nSample_ += 1;
00148       } else {
00149          nReject_ += 1;
00150       }
00151    }
00152    
00153    /* 
00154    * Output histogram
00155    */
00156    void IntDistribution::output(std::ostream& out) 
00157    {
00158       for (int i=0; i < nBin_; ++i) {
00159          out << Int(i + min_) << Int(histogram_[i]) << std::endl;
00160       }
00161    }

00167    void IntDistribution::backup(FILE *file)

00170       fprintf(file, "nReject       %i \n", nReject_);
00171       for (int i=0; i < nBin_; ++i) {
00172          fprintf(file, "%li ", histogram_[i]);

00180    void IntDistribution::restore(FILE *file) {
00181       fscanf(file, "nSample       %i \n", &nSample_);
00182       fscanf(file, "nReject       %i \n", &nReject_);
00183       for (int i=0; i < nBin_; ++i) {
00184          fscanf(file, "%li ", &histogram_[i]);
00185       }
